title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children node listing is not displayed.
SR:
1. Open the data set editor.
2. Create a new data set without SQL statement.
3. Ensure that the new data source has no database/table/column information.
4. Change the data source for the data set.
5. Verify that the children node listing is not displayed.
6. Close the data set editor.
7. Reopen the data set editor and verify if the issue persists.
